alert.note: Alert for Mason; McLean; Schuyler; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 1:43AM CST until February 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow. Additional snow accumulations under one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Woodford, Tazewell, McLean, Schuyler and Mason Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. East-west roadways may see significant drifting of snow, especially in rural areas. Visibility may be occasionally reduced as well. Travel will be difficult or impossible on problem roadways. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com
